view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.View

  • public class View
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to hold all GUI-related containers.

    • Constructor Detail

      • View

        public View(SkillSet skills,
            Inventory inventory)
        Creates a new View, once the game has started, displaying the world, the player's inventory and skill set as provided by the parameters.
        Parameters:
        skills - The game's player's skill set.
        inventory - The game's player's inventory.
